item.title: Getting a MAC Address on a Mac
item.description: Hey there. Recently, I needed to write some code in C to get the MAC address of a particular interface. On Linux, this is pretty easy to do. However, on BSD systems and, more importantly, on macOS, it wasn’t as straightforward and I had to do some digging to find an answer.
